entry.title: A tip for hide statues bar
entry.content:
Normally we can simply override in the specific UIViewController

override var prefersStatusBarHidden: Bool {
        return true
    }

But, if you are using UISplitViewController, the overriding have to be into the split view controller. You can use a simple extension:

extension UISplitViewController {    
    override open var prefersStatusBarHidden: Bool {
        return true
    }
}

entry.title: Xcode Warnings Log #001
entry.summary: <CATransformLayer: 0x283788760> - changing property contentsGravity in transform-only layer, will have no effect
entry.content:
<CATransformLayer: 0x283788760> - changing property contentsGravity in transform-only layer, will have no effect

Maybe set Content Mode of UIStackView to other than the default value "Scale to Fill":

entry.title: Papa is here
entry.summary:
Hi baby,
Papa is here. Where do you want Papa rush to?
entry.content:
